resources.string: JAI Hind everyone I am Rachit Katiyar, currently pursuing a Bachelor of Technology Degree in Computer Science Engineering with a specification in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning from Ajay Kumar Garg Engineering College, Ghaziabad. I have completed my schooling from Sir Padampat Singhania Education Centre, Kanpur. I am a hardworking person with a positive attitude towards life and career. I always try to keep a forward-thinking approach. I have got 96% in my XII Board Exam. Philosophy for life: One day without laughter is a day wasted. Strengths: I see failure as a way to improve. Sometimes our views about success and failure are tied on what other people think about us or judge us. According to me staying positive is the best way to overcome failure. Weakness: My tendency to take too much responsibility and discomfort about delegating task is my biggest weakness. Hobbies: My hobbies include acting, script writing, dancing, surfing the net for knowledge, learning, Netflix and chill. Achievement: 2nd in rotary club annual debate
